subject: You've won the jackpot!
content: Congratulations! You've been selected as the lucky winner of our $10 million jackpot. To claim your prize, please provide your bank details and identification. Act now before this once-in-a-lifetime opportunity expires. Remember, this is a limited time offer!

subject: Insane travel deals just for you!
content: Fly to exotic destinations for less than $100! Our spring blowout sale includes round-trip tickets to over 50 locations worldwide. No hidden fees. Book today and travel tomorrow. But hurry — offers expire in 24 hours!

subject: Weekly team meeting notes

subject: Get slim in 5 days – no exercise!

subject: Re: Budget approval for Q2
content: Thanks for sharing the updated budget. I've reviewed the figures and everything looks good for approval. Just waiting on final confirmation from finance. Please hold off on distribution until we get the green light from them.
